name: EVAC (itch) (Don6l)
description:
EVAC is a sci-fi strategy game made by Gear Light Games during Ludum Dare 43.

You take control of Earths final battle ship as you race to the safety of Titus trying to save as many colonies from an unstoppable alien armada. 

Be careful with your choices, each colony has different assets that may help you save more colonist so you must decide who to save and who to leave behind. 

You can't save everyone but to have a chance at saving some...sacrifices must be made!

Controls:

Click the screen to fire the perfectly timed shot to blow your enemies and their missiles from the sky before they hit you or your transport vessels. 

If things get too hairy press the space bar to fly away, saving yourself but leaving the remaining population to die!

Team Members: 

Lindsay Robertson - Writer

Thomas O'Boyle - Audio/Music

Jame Byrne - Programmer

Catherine W. - Artist

Matthew Knight - Programmer

Donal McClean - Programmer 

Make sure to comment with how many people you managed to save!
